ence":[1329,2485],"barter":[1332],"simply":[1339],"assumed":[1340,1783],"away.66":[1341],"Attempts":[1342],"represent":[1344],"\u2018model":[1345],"uncertainty\u2019":[1346],"terms":[1348,1378,2055,2606],"probabilities":[1350,1401,1425,1436,1477,1480,1484,1496,1502,1504,1562,1598],"growing":[1355],"literature":[1356,1369],"ambiguity":[1358],"incompatible":[1361],"behind":[1367,4178],"might":[1375,1898,4051],"probability":[1381],"distribution":[1382,1410],"outcomes":[1384],"outcome":[1391],"occur,":[1393],"those":[1400,3148,3324,4224,4269],"model":[1404,1445],"can":[1407,1494,1760,2118,2315,2756,2814,3607,3615,3990,4333,4648],"imagine":[1408],"probabilities.":[1412],"Ambiguity":[1413],"defined":[1416],"degree":[1419,2013,4185],"subjective":[1424,1483],"use":[1428,1804,2277,2936,3162],"formulate":[1430],"their":[1431,1750,2080,2833,3278,3289,3783,4563,4575],"\u2018optimal\u2019":[1432],"plans.":[1433],"These":[1434],"higher-order":[1435],"supposed":[1438],"world.":[1448,2337,4042,4788,4978],"Just":[1449],"risk":[1453],"averse,":[1454],"exhibit":[1458],"\u2018ambiguity":[1459],"aversion\u2019.":[1460],"second-order":[1469],"probabilities?":[1470],"allow":[1475,2686],"used":[1485,1762,1873,3668],"individuals?":[1487],"why":[1489,1500,2307],"stop":[1490,4484],"there?":[1491],"If":[1492],"probabilities,":[1498,1506],"on.":[1509],"We":[1510,4789],"naturally":[1512],"treacherous":[1516],"infinite":[1520],"regress,":[1521],"Savage":[1525,1613,1639],"(1954,":[1526,1640],"58)":[1528],"considered":[1529],"rejected":[1531],"\u201cseems":[1534],"very":[1535],"interpret,":[1538],"seems":[1541,2159],"best":[1543],"less":[1548,2296,2493,2495],"realistic,":[1549],"more\u201d.":[1551],"plain":[1553],"language,":[1554],"dead":[1556],"end:":[1557],"either":[1558,2892],"resolvable":[1570],"don't":[1574],"1954,":[1585],"Chicago":[1587],"statistician,":[1588],"Jimmie":[1589],"Savage,":[1590],"imagined":[1591],"could":[1596,1608,1646,2805,4447],"attach":[1597],"every":[1600],"conceivable":[
